mapper.select: select manager_no as no, manager_id as id, manager_password as password, manager_check as isChecked from manager where manager_id = #{value}

select user_no as no, user_id as id, user_name as name, user_birth as birth, user_gender as gender, user_tel as tel, user_address as address, user_point as point, user_delete_check as deleteCheck, user_email as email, user_type as type, user_created_date as createdDate, user_sms_check as smsCheck, user_email_Check as emailCheck from user_table order by user_no

select user_no as no, user_id as id, user_name as name, user_birth as birth, user_gender as gender, user_tel as tel, user_address as address, user_point as point, user_delete_check as deleteCheck, user_email as email, user_type as type, user_created_date as createdDate, user_sms_check as smsCheck, user_email_check as emailCheck, user_deleted_date as deletedDate from (select row_number() over(order by user_no) rn, user_no, user_id, user_name, user_birth, user_gender, user_tel, user_address, user_point, user_delete_check, user_email, user_type, user_created_date, user_sms_check, user_email_check, user_deleted_date from user_table
user_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
user_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and user_delete_check = 1
and user_email_check is not null
and user_sms_check is not null
) where rn >= #{begin} and rn <= #{end}

select count(*) from user_table
user_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
user_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and user_delete_check = 1
and user_email_check is not null
and user_sms_check is not null
select count(*) from user_table where user_delete_check = 0 group by user_gender

with age_count as (select age, count(*) as cnt from ( select CASE when floor((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') - (to_char(user_birth, 'yyyy'))) / 10) * 10 < 20 then 10 when floor((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') - (to_char(user_birth, 'yyyy'))) / 10) * 10 < 30 then 20 when floor((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') - (to_char(user_birth, 'yyyy'))) / 10) * 10 < 40 then 30 when floor((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') - (to_char(user_birth, 'yyyy'))) / 10) * 10 < 50 then 40 else 50 end as age from user_table where user_delete_check = 0 and user_type = 'normal') group by age), ages as ( select level * 10 age from dual connect by level <=5) select b.age as age, nvl(a.cnt, 0) as count from age_count a, ages b where a.age(+) = b.age order by b.age

select a.rn as rowNo, t1.station_name || ' ▶ ' || t2.station_name as destination, a.cnt as count, r.route_image as image from train_route r, train_station t1, train_station t2, (select row_number() over (order by count(*) desc) rn, s.route_no, count(*) cnt from train_ticket t, train_schedule s, train_reservation n where t.is_canceled = 'N' and t.schedule_no = s.schedule_no and to_char(n.reservation_date, 'yyyy-mm') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm') and t.reservation_no = n.reservation_no group by s.route_no) a where r.route_no = a.route_no and a.rn >=1 and a.rn <= 4 and r.departure_station_id = t1.station_id and r.arrival_station_id = t2.station_id order by a.rn

select r.restaurant_name as destination, r.restaurant_picture as image, a.cnt as count from restaurant r, (select row_number() over (order by count(*) desc) rn, e.restaurant_no, count(*) cnt from restaurant_reservation e, restaurant r where to_char(e.payment_date, 'yyyy-mm') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm') and e.reservation_process = '결제완료' and r.restaurant_no = e.restaurant_no group by e.restaurant_no) a where r.restaurant_no = a.restaurant_no and a.rn >=1 and a.rn <= 4 order by a.rn

select n.att_name as destination, n.att_thumbnail as image, b.cnt as count from attraction n, (select row_number() over(order by count(*) desc) rn, o.att_no, count(*) cnt from att_order o, attraction a where to_char(o.payment_date, 'yyyy-mm') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm') and o.att_no = a.att_no and o.order_process = '결제완료' group by o.att_no) b where n.att_no = b.att_no and b.rn >=1 and b.rn <= 4 order by b.rn

with sumDate as ( select A.dates, SUM(DECODE(A.months, to_char(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -1), 'mm'), A.CNT, 0)) before, SUM(DECODE(A.months, to_char(sysdate, 'mm'), A.CNT, 0)) now from (select count(*) CNT, to_char(USER_CREATED_DATE, 'mm') months, to_char(USER_CREATED_DATE, 'fmdd') dates from user_table where to_char(USER_CREATED_DATE, 'yyyy/mm') in (to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm'), to_char(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -1), 'yyyy/mm')) group by to_char(USER_CREATED_DATE, 'mm'), to_char(USER_CREATED_DATE, 'fmdd') ) A group by a.dates), createdDate as ( select level as lab from dual connect by level <= 31) select d.lab as dates, nvl(s.now, 0) as now, nvl(s.before, 0) as before from sumDate s, createdDate d where s.dates(+) = d.lab order by d.lab

with userAge as ( select CASE WHEN floor((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - (to_char(user_birth, 'YYYY'))) / 10) * 10 < 20 THEN 10 WHEN floor((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - (to_char(user_birth, 'YYYY'))) / 10) * 10 < 30 THEN 20 WHEN floor((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - (to_char(user_birth, 'YYYY'))) / 10) * 10 < 40 THEN 30 WHEN floor((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - (to_char(user_birth, 'YYYY'))) / 10) * 10 < 50 THEN 40 ELSE 50 END AS AGE, user_no from user_table where user_type = 'normal'), ages as ( select level * 10 age from dual connect by level <=5) select s.age as age, nvl((select sum(t.RESERVATION_DEPOSIT) from RESTAURANT_RESERVATION t, userAge a where t.RESERVATION_PROCESS = '결제완료' and a.user_no = t.user_no and a.age = s.age group by a.age), 0) as restaurantPayment, nvl((select sum(r.total_payment_amount) from train_reservation r, userAge a where r.ticketing_status in ('결제', '취소') and a.user_no = r.user_no and a.age = s.age group by a.age), 0) as trainPayment, nvl((select sum(o.order_lastprice) from ATT_ORDER o, userAge a where ORDER_PROCESS = '결제완료' and a.user_no = o.user_no and a.age = s.age group by a.age), 0) as attractionPayment from ages s

with gender as ( select distinct user_gender gen from user_table a) select gen as gender, (select sum(t.RESERVATION_DEPOSIT) from RESTAURANT_RESERVATION t, user_table a where t.RESERVATION_PROCESS = '결제완료' and a.user_no = t.user_no and a.user_gender = g.gen group by a.user_gender) as restaurantPayment, (select sum(r.total_payment_amount) from train_reservation r, user_table a where r.ticketing_status in ('결제', '취소') and a.user_no = r.user_no and a.user_gender = g.gen group by a.user_gender) as trainPayment, (select sum(o.order_lastprice) from ATT_ORDER o, user_table a where ORDER_PROCESS = '결제완료' and a.user_no = o.user_no and a.user_gender = g.gen group by a.user_gender) as attractionPayment from gender g

select count(decode(ticketing_status, '결제', reservation_no)) as finish, count(decode(ticketing_status, '예약', reservation_no)) as reservaion, count(decode(ticketing_status, '취소', reservation_no)) as cancel from train_reservation where to_char(reservation_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') or to_char(canceled_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') or to_char(sold_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select count(decode(reservation_process, '결제완료', reservation_no)) as finish, count(decode(reservation_process, '예약', reservation_no)) as reservaion, count(decode(reservation_process, '취소', reservation_no)) as cancel from restaurant_reservation where to_char(payment_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by reservation_process

select count(decode(order_process, '결제완료', order_no)) as finish, count(decode(order_process, '예약', order_no)) as reservaion, count(decode(order_process, '취소', order_no)) as cancel from att_order where to_char(payment_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by order_process
